title: Geoff Maxey 2020
name: Geoff Maxey
bio:
Geoff comes with over 15 years of experience as a developer, technical architect and cloud solutions architect for various projects ranging from national newspapers, US Federal government, and worldwide events including FIFA World Cup and the London, Rio, and Pyongchang Olympics.\
Geoff currently works as a Technical Account Manager with Acquia which was founded by Dries Buytaert the founder of the Drupal CMS project.\
Geoff works with enterprise level customers and large events to provide expert consultation on best practices with cloud architecture and the Drupal CMS to ensure that any client is best tuned to handle whatever the internet may through at them.\
While not buried in the world of client work, Geoff enjoyâ€™s playing bass in various local music groups, running D&D games and working with various charities within the community to give back more.
